snippet: The executives who headed financial institutions in 2009, when markets and banks were being supported by the government, are now in line to receive hundreds of millions of dollars in compensation.
abstract: The executives who headed financial institutions in 2009, when markets and banks were being supported by the government, are now in line to receive hundreds of millions of dollars in compensation.

headline.main: In Market Rebound, a Windfall for Wall Street Executives
headline.print_headline: In Stock Market Rebound, a Windfall for Wall St. Executives
